Create a new instance of UIToolBarMain, with the given properties.

Parameters:
oManager - the IUIToolBarManager that is managing this toolbar.
parent - the parent frame for the application.
nType - the unique identifier for this toolbar.
isSimple - is the user in simple interface mode. True for yes, false for advanced mode.
